metadataAttributes.Title: Core Java Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Learn the Skills Needed to be a Java Programmer. Quickly master the Java programming language and the packages that constitute its rich set of core libraries.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Computer Programming, Java Programming, Web Development, Java Database Connectivity (JDBC), Java Class Library, Object-Oriented Programming (OOP), Crt0, Recursively Enumerable Set, Java Compiler, Javac, Iterator, Linearity,
